message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $120. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  I could come down to $110, but I can't go any lower than that. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer with $100. I hope this meets your expectations.
